New Records: Tanner Bibee pitched 6.0 innings, gave up two hits, allowed one earned run, struck out six hitters, and walked three batters.
Brayan Rocchio hit a two-run homer in the top of the seventh inning and worked a walk with the bases loaded for an RBI in the eighth inning.
Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee escaped a bases-loaded jam in the sixth inning to keep the Royals from scoring multiple runs.
Brayan Rocchio's two-run home run in the seventh inning gave the Guardians a significant lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' win helped them get back on track in their divisional race.
